North Korea's Kim seeks 'industry revolution' in rural areas amid widening inequalityNorth Korean leader Kim Jong Un has called for an "industry revolution" in rural regions by building factories nationwide, state media KCNA said on Thursday, amid chronic food shortages and widening economic inequality. China willing to enhance economic, trade cooperation with Egypt, commerce minister saysChina is willing to further promote economic and trade cooperation with Egypt, and to continue to encourage and support its enterprises to invest and start businesses in the African country, the Chinese commerce ministry cited its minister as saying. Polestar raises almost $1 bln, sees margins improving in 2024Polestar said on Wednesday it had raised a $950 million loan from a bank syndicate, helping to fill a gap left when Volvo Cars said it would stop funding the electric carmaker, sending its New York-listed shares 18.5% higher.
